title: Volume up gives audible of current time and doesn't raise volume
content:
When I long press volume up will repeat the time back to me and not raise the volume. 
Specific message "it's [insert time here].  To hear your notifications, turn on notification access on your phone.  Just touch and hold the home button , then tap headphone settings"
I am using Google USB C ear buds and the behavior doesn't happen when then aren't connected.  Short single clicks on volume up button do work.  Can't find button settings for this, please help.
